title: White guys for Harris!
text: I live in a middle of nowhere farm country town surrounded by Trump flags and signs everywhere I see, but not all of us country folk are so ignorant. You see, for the rights of my mixed girlfriend, our economy not getting ruined by Trump tariffs, basic human decency, and a brighter future for our beautiful country, I made sure to get out and vote for Harris. If you haven’t already, please get out and vote y’all!
